text: "That's So True" is a song by American singer-songwriter Gracie Abrams. It was released through Interscope Records on November 6, 2024, as the first single from the deluxe edition of her second studio album, The Secret of Us (2024). "That's So True" peaked at number six on the Billboard Hot 100. ==References== Category:2024 songs Category:Gracie Abrams songs
title: That's So True
